original_text: And changed his prison garments: and he did continually eat bread before him all the days of his life.
korean_text: 그 죄수의 의복을 갈아 입혔고 그의 평생 동안 항상 왕의 앞에서 먹게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: and he did continually eat bread before him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 항상 그 앞에서 빵을 먹었으며

sentences.original_text: all the days of his life.
